message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll really love. I'm willing to let it go for $250. What do you think?
I'm really interested in the product, but $250 is a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $150 for it. Can you meet me at this price?

I understand that $250 is a bit steep for you, but I'm willing to compromise. I can do $220 for the product. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really appreciate the value it brings. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Can you meet me at $180? I think that's a fair price for this product.

I understand that $180 is still a bit of a stretch for you, but I'm willing to make one more concession. I can do $200 for the product. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really appreciate the value it brings. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still trying to stretch my budget as far as I can. Can you meet me at $180? I really think that's the best I can do.
